text: Pas, cun [firistodai malika] nazdi Sulajmon omad, [Sulajmon] guft: «Ojo [mexohed] ʙo mol [-u sarvat] ʙa man kumak kuned? On ci Alloh taolo [az pajomʙari va donisu farmonravi] ʙa man ʙaxsida, az on cize, ki ʙa sumo ato karda ʙehtar ast, ʙalki sumoed, ki ʙa hadjai xes [va sarvathoi dunjo] sodmon mesaved
